colti:
Technical operations projects series ; no.
            TO 643

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed credit would assist in
            financing the construction or extension of two institutes
            for agricultural technician training, two teacher training
            institutes and selected secondary schools, and the provision
            of specialist teachers and teacher fellowships.
